item.title: Docker Images
item.description: Some standards I have come up over time to standardize the process of building Docker images: Use of multi-stage builds Docker images make use of multi-stage build to reduce their size to include tests in the build Home directory for code /opt/{name}

item.title: Makefile
item.description: To simplify working with several projects, I have set up some standards: Help Each Makefile should contain a help command: help: ## Show this help. @echo '' @echo 'Available commands:' @grep -E '^[a-zA-Z_-]+:.*?## .*$$' $(MAKEFILE_LIST) | sort | awk 'BEGIN {FS = ":.*?## "}; {printf "\033[36m%-30s\033[0m %s\n", $$1, $$2}' @echo '' .PHONY: help Readme gen-readme: ## Generate the README.md file. npm run docs .PHONY: gen-readme
